scripts.start:backend: cd backend && npm start && kubectl port-forward --address 0.0.0.0 -n default service/app 30000:5000
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm start && kubectl port-forward --address 0.0.0.0 -n default service/angular 32000:4200
scripts.start: (minikube status > /dev/null || minikube start) && eval $(minikube docker-env) && npm run start:services
